categories: Category:Imperial Army enlisted personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: An Imperial Army pilot served under Commander Orlok of the Galactic Empire on the remote planet Daluuj in the months following the Battle of Yavin. The Humanoid individual piloted one of three Imperial ground-skimmers in a failed effort to defeat the Rebels Han Solo and Luke Skywalker, who had journeyed to Daluuj to rescue the imperiled Mon Calamari Admiral Gial Ackbar.
